body: I am Aditya Kumar, a passionate developer with expertise in building smart and efficient digital solutions. With a strong foundation in web and mobile app development, I specialize in crafting seamless user experiences, integrating advanced technologies like geolocation, databases, and automation into my projects.

Enables seamless, automatic attendance tracking for employees and students using geolocation.Provides detailed insights, including average work time, average break time, days present, and days absent.

A fully functional version release 1.2.1 for Android. Samarth: NFC-Based Attendance System Samarth is an innovative NFC-based attendance management system designed to simplify and automate the attendance tracking process. 3. Link Shortener A fully featured URL shortener capable of handling up to 1.6 million links. It leverages Google Sheets as a backend database to store key details such as time, date, IP address, original URL, and shortened URL. Additionally, it offers a modern UI for creating customized links.

Powered by a MySQL database, the platform includes dedicated sections for both renters and owners. Owners can seamlessly upload car details, while renters can browse and select vehicles based on their preferences. Additionally, the system features integrated payment calculations for a streamlined rental experience.
